title: Project Overview – WIS 76 – Outagamie & Waupaca counties
text:
[Skip to content](https://projects.511wi.gov/wis76cirshioc/full-project-overview/#content)

**[![](https://projects.511wi.gov/wis76cirshioc/wp-content/uploads/sites/1025/2map76.jpg)](https://projects.511wi.gov/wis76cirshioc/wp-content/uploads/sites/1025/2map76.jpg)**

**2024 CONSTRUCTION BEGINS APRIL 29, 2024.**

- Full closures of WIS 22 at US 45 begins April 29.
- Full closure of WIS 76 between US 45 and WIS 54 begins May 9.

**Project locations**

The WIS 76 improvements are separated into three individual projects that extend from WIS 54 in the village of Shiocton to the US 45/WIS 76/WIS 22 intersection west of the village of Bear Creek in the towns of Bovina, Liberty, Maple Creek and Deer Creek in the counties of Outagamie and Waupaca. Each project is identified by a unique Project​​​ ID.

- **Waupaca County project:** Outagamie/Waupaca County Line to US 45 (Project ID 6518-00-70)
- **Outagamie County project**: WIS 54 to Outagamie/Waupaca County Line (Project ID 6518-06-71)
- **Outagamie County bridge project:** Bridge structures between Boelter​ Road and County W (Project ID 6518-07-71). Complete 2023.
 - WisDOT created a project exhibit showing locations of all three projects on a color-coded display map:
 - [View all project on WIS 76 projects exhibit](https://wisconsindot.gov/Documents/projects/by-region/ne/76shiocton/map2.pdf)

**Project benefits**

The existing pavement is showing signs of distress including traverse cracking and the existing joints are failing. The purpose of the project is to improve the deteriorating pavement and structures on WIS 76, extend the roadway’s service life, decrease maintenance costs, and upgrade other roadway deficiencies to improve safety.   Intersection modifications will provide improved turning movements and increase safety.

**Project improvements** ​​

Project ID 6518-00-70 (Waupaca County: County Line to US 45)

- Mill/overlay of the existing pavement
- Realigning median islands on WIS 76/WIS 22 at US 45 intersection
- Widening for an improved right turn lane on WIS 22 at US 45 intersection
- Pavement markings and shoulder gravel

Project ID 6518-06-71 (Outagamie County: WIS 54 to County Line)

- Mill/overlay of existing pavement
- Culvert replacements (complete 2023)
- Beamguard replacements
- Curb ramp replacements within the village of Bear Creek
- Pavement markings and shoulder gravel

Project ID 6518-07-71 (Outagamie County bridges)

- Replace two existing bridges with box culverts (complete 2023)
- Pavement markings and shoulder gravel (complete 2023)

Please see our project design display showing locations of specific construction operations:

- [View WIS 76 project design display](https://wisconsindot.gov/Documents/projects/by-region/ne/76shiocton/76display.pdf)

**Project schedule**

Construction is scheduled to resume on April 29, 2024 and finish in summer 2024.

**Traffic impacts**

- **Full closure of WIS 22 at US 45 begins April 29, 2024.**
- **Full closure of WIS 76 between US 45 and WIS 54 begins May 9, 2024.**

Full closures, lane closures, and flagging operations will be utilized at various times during construction. Construction will be staged in a manner to minimize traffic disruptions. Access to businesses and property owners will always be maintained.

- Beginning May 6, 2024: WIS 76 will be detoured for the culvert, paving and structure replacement work.
 - The detour will follow WIS 54 and US 45.
 - [View WIS 76 detour route in display map](https://projects.511wi.gov/wis76cirshioc/wp-content/uploads/sites/1025/76detour.pdf)

- Beginning April 29, 2024: The west leg of US 45/WIS 76/WIS 22 will be closed for intersection improvements. WIS 22 will be detoured for 45 days.
 - The detour route will utilize County T and County O.
 - [View WIS 22 detour route in display map](https://projects.511wi.gov/wis76cirshioc/wp-content/uploads/sites/1025/22detour.pdf)

- Traffic control in the form of flagging operations will be used to close one lane at a time in portions of the work zone.
- Businesses affected by the detours are urged to use the resources noted below for businesses in work zones.

**[![](https://projects.511wi.gov/wis76cirshioc/wp-content/uploads/sites/1025/bizpic.jpg)](https://projects.511wi.gov/wis76cirshioc/wp-content/uploads/sites/1025/bizpic.jpg) Temporary business signing and business resources**

Temporary business signing may be placed during the detoured portion of the project by filling out a WisDOT business signing permit. All temporary business signing needs approval via the permit before placement to ensure it is in a safe location and does not pose a visual distraction or traffic hazard. The temporary business signing permit is free. Costs associated with creating the temporary sign are the responsibility of the business. The permit is available as a fillable-form WORD document or pdf below, or you can request one from the project contacts below.

- [Download Temporary Business Sign Permit](https://projects.511wi.gov/wis76cirshioc/wp-content/uploads/sites/1025/businesssignpermit.docx) (Fillable-form WORD)
- [Download Temporary Business Sign Permit](https://projects.511wi.gov/wis76cirshioc/wp-content/uploads/sites/1025/businesssignpermit.pdf) (PDF)
 - Please email or mail the free permit to any of the contacts below.

For more information regarding temporary signing, plus tips and tools for businesses impacted by highway construction, please visit WisDOT’s “In This Together” business resource website. The In This Together program is offered to business and community leaders as an idea source as they plan for road construction in their area.

- [Visit WisDOT’s In This Together Website](https://wisconsindot.gov/Pages/projects/in-together/default.aspx)

title: Jogo Responsável no 0066 bet com
text:
Jogo Responsável - 0066 bet com | Política de Jogos Seguros
# Jogo Responsável no 0066 bet com
No 0066 bet com, acreditamos que o jogo responsável éfundamental para uma experiência segura e divertida. Nosso compromisso vai além de oferecer entretenimento de qualidade - queremos garantir que cada jogador tenha controle total sobre suas atividades de jogo.
O jogo responsável no 0066 bet com significa criar um ambiente onde o entretenimento seja saudável e nunca se torne um problema. Implementamos diversas ferramentas e políticas para apoiar nossos usuários nessa jornada.
## Nossa Filosofia de Jogo Responsável
O 0066 bet com defende que o jogo deve ser sempre uma forma de entretenimento, nunca uma necessidade ou escapismo. Nossa plataforma foi desenvolvida com recursos que promovem o jogo responsável em todos os aspectos.
Entendemos que cada jogador tem necessidades diferentes, e por isso oferecemos ferramentas personalizáveis que permitem adaptar a experiência de jogo às suas preferências e limites pessoais.
**Importante:**O jogo responsável no 0066 bet com éuma responsabilidade compartilhada. Enquanto fornecemos as ferramentas e recursos necessários, éessencial que cada jogador se comprometa com práticas saudáveis de jogo.
## Ferramentas de Controle Disponíveis
O 0066 bet com oferece um conjunto abrangente de ferramentas para ajudar você a manter o controle sobre suas atividades de jogo:
### Limites de Depósito
Você pode estabelecer limites diários, semanais ou mensais para seus depósitos no 0066 bet com. Esses limites ajudam a garantir que você não gaste mais do que pode permitir.
### Limites de Tempo
Configure lembretes e limites de tempo para suas sessões de jogo. O 0066 bet com irá notificá-lo quando você atingir o tempo definido, ajudando a manter um equilíbrio saudável.
### Limites de Perda
Estabeleça um limite máximo de perdas para proteger seu orçamento. Quando esse limite for atingido, o 0066 bet com restringirá temporariamente o acesso aos jogos.
### Autoexclusão
Para momentos em que você precisa de uma pausa mais longa, o 0066 bet com oferece opções de autoexclusão temporária ou permanente da plataforma.
## Sinais de Alerta e Prevenção
O 0066 bet com monitora constantemente padrões de jogo que podem indicar comportamentos problemáticos. Nosso sistema identifica automaticamente sinais de alerta e pode sugerir pausas ou limitações quando necessário.
Alguns sinais importantes que todos devem conhecer:
* Gastar mais tempo ou dinheiro do que planejado no 0066 bet com
* Sentir necessidade de aumentar constantemente as apostas
* Usar o jogo como escape de problemas pessoais
* Negligenciar responsabilidades familiares ou profissionais
* Mentir sobre atividades de jogo para familiares ou amigos
* Sentir ansiedade ou irritabilidade quando não está jogando
**Dica:**Se você reconhece algum desses sinais, não hesite em usar as ferramentas de controle do 0066 bet com ou procurar ajuda profissional. Agir cedo ésempre a melhor estratégia.
## Educação e Conscientização
O 0066 bet com investe continuamente em educação sobre jogo responsável. Oferecemos materiais informativos, dicas e recursos para ajudar nossos usuários a entender melhor os aspectos do jogo responsável.
Nossa equipe está sempre disponível para esclarecer dúvidas sobre práticas de jogo responsável e como utilizar as ferramentas disponíveis no 0066 bet com de forma eficaz.
### Recursos Educacionais
Disponibilizamos uma biblioteca completa de recursos educacionais sobre jogo responsável, incluindo artigos, vídeos e guias práticos que ajudam a promover uma experiência de jogo mais saudável.
### Workshops e Webinars
O 0066 bet com organiza regularmente workshops e webinars sobre jogo responsável, onde especialistas compartilham conhecimentos e estratégias para manter o controle sobre as atividades de jogo.
## Proteção de Menores
O 0066 bet com tem tolerância zero com jogos por menores de idade. Implementamos verificações rigorosas de idade e sistemas de monitoramento para garantir que apenas adultos tenham acesso ànossa plataforma.
Nossos sistemas de verificação incluem:
* Verificação obrigatória de identidade no registro
* Monitoramento contínuo de atividades suspeitas
* Bloqueio automático de contas que não atendem aos critérios de idade
* Cooperação com autoridades quando necessário## Suporte e Recursos de Ajuda
O 0066 bet com mantém uma equipe especializada em jogo responsável, treinada para oferecer suporte compassivo e eficaz. Nossa equipe está disponível para orientar sobre o uso das ferramentas de controle e fornecer apoio quando necessário.
Além do suporte interno, mantemos parcerias com organizações especializadas em tratamento de jogos compulsivos, garantindo que nossos usuários tenham acesso aos melhores recursos de ajuda disponíveis.
### Contatos de Emergência

text:
## Cloud Consulting Services

Specialized cloud services allocated by competent AWS experts can greatly enhance the efficiency and effectiveness of your organization's cloud infrastructure. These experts have a deep understanding of AWS's wide range of services and can provide tailored solutions to meet your specific business needs.

## High-Quality End-To-End Cloud Services

0scale brings an entire range of cloud consulting services to organizations all over the industries. Our experienced cloud masters have facilitated hundreds of companies handling all important workloads.

### ABOUT 0SCALE

## We are the foremost multi-cloud consulting partner in Canada.

0scale takes pride in providing an extensive range of cutting-edge cloud services and consulting solutions to clients at all stages of their cloud journey. Regardless of your industry or company size, our unwavering commitment is to resolve your complex challenges and discover untapped opportunities that enable you to reach your business goals.

## WHAT WE **DO**

**Getting Started**

-   Cloud Assessment
-   Clear Path Forward
-   Cloud Adoption

**Accelerating Success**

-   Cloud Launchpad
-   Cloud Security
-   Managed Public Cloud

**Optimizing Productivity**

-   App and Database Modernization
-   Kubernetes Enablement
-   Data Analytics

## Highly Demanding **Services**

[Setup CICD pipeline](https://www.0scale.io/cicd-pipeline.php)

We specialize in helping businesses optimize their software development process through the implementation of robust CI/CD pipelines.

[Hire our DevOps](https://www.0scale.io/cloud-devops.php)

We offer top-notch DevOps services to help businesses thrive in today's fast-paced digital landscape.

[AWS Connect](https://www.0scale.io/aws-connect.php)

We bring you the cutting-edge capabilities of AWS Connect to revolutionize your customer service operations.

[On Premises to AWS](https://www.0scale.io/onpremisis-aws.php)

We specialize in helping businesses smoothly transition their on-premises infrastructure to the dynamic and scalable environment of AWS (Amazon Web Services).

[Containerize Application](https://www.0scale.io/containerize-application.php)

Containerization is a transformative approach that empowers businesses to build and deliver applications more effectively in today's fast-paced and dynamic technology landscape.

[Cloud Migration](https://www.0scale.io/cloud-migration.php)

Transfer your applications, database, and servers to the cloud without troublesome consistent operations

## BOOK A **CONSULTANT**

Sure, I can help you with consultancy booking for Cloud Solution, DevOps, and Application Development using .NET and multiple stacks. Here's an overview of the process:

- Initial Consultation: We'll start with an initial consultation to understand your requirements, business objectives, and current technology landscape. This will help us identify the specific areas where you need assistance.
- Needs Assessment: Our team of experts will perform a comprehensive needs assessment, evaluating your existing infrastructure, application architecture, DevOps practices, and any specific challenges you're facing. This assessment will guide the recommendations and solutions we provide.
- Cloud Solution Design: Based on your requirements and objectives, we'll design a customized cloud solution leveraging platforms such as Microsoft Azure, Amazon Web Services (AWS), or Google Cloud Platform (GCP). This will include defining the appropriate cloud services, networking, storage, and security architecture to meet your application's needs.
- DevOps Implementation: We'll assist you in implementing a robust DevOps pipeline that integrates with your chosen cloud solution. This will involve setting up continuous integration (CI) and continuous deployment (CD) processes, automating build and release management, and implementing infrastructure as code (IaC) practices.
- Application Development: Our team of skilled developers, proficient in .NET and other stacks, will work closely with you to design and develop your application. We'll follow best practices for software development, ensuring scalability, performance, and maintainability.
- Containerization and Orchestration: If required, we can help containerize your application using technologies like Docker and orchestrate them using platforms like Kubernetes. This will provide portability, scalability, and improved deployment efficiency.
- Monitoring and Optimization: We'll implement robust monitoring and logging solutions, leveraging tools like Azure Monitor, AWS CloudWatch, or similar offerings. This will allow you to gain insights into application performance, resource utilization, and identify areas for optimization.
- Ongoing Support and Maintenance: We provide ongoing support and maintenance services to ensure the smooth operation of your cloud solution, DevOps pipeline, and applications. This includes troubleshooting, performance optimization, and applying necessary updates and patches.

To book a consultancy session, please provide your contact information, preferred date and time, and any specific topics or challenges you would like to discuss. Our team will reach out to you to schedule the consultation and provide further details.
Please note that consultancy services are billed on an hourly or project basis, depending on the scope and duration of the engagement.

## Hire Our **DevOps Experts**

Are you looking to optimize your cloud infrastructure and streamline your development and operations processes? Look no further! Our team of highly skilled DevOps experts specializing in cloud technologies, including Azure, AWS, and GCP, is here to help you achieve your goals.

- Extensive Cloud Expertise: Our DevOps team possesses deep knowledge and hands-on experience with leading cloud platforms such as Microsoft Azure, Amazon Web Services (AWS), and Google Cloud Platform (GCP). They are adept at leveraging the unique features and services offered by each platform to design, build, and manage scalable and resilient cloud infrastructure.
- Cloud Architecture and Design: Our DevOps experts have a strong foundation in cloud architecture and design principles. They will analyze your specific business requirements, assess your existing infrastructure, and design a cloud solution tailored to your needs. Whether it's migrating to the cloud, optimizing your current setup, or architecting a new environment, our team will ensure an efficient and secure cloud infrastructure.
- Continuous Integration and Deployment: We specialize in implementing robust DevOps practices, including continuous integration (CI) and continuous deployment (CD) pipelines. Our DevOps experts will automate your software build, test, and deployment processes, enabling rapid and error-free application releases. They will utilize industry-leading tools like Jenkins, Azure DevOps, AWS CodePipeline, and Google Cloud Build to streamline your development workflow.
- Infrastructure as Code (IaC): Our team embraces Infrastructure as Code (IaC) methodologies to automate the provisioning and management of your cloud infrastructure. With tools like Azure Resource Manager (ARM) templates, AWS CloudFormation, and GCP Deployment Manager, our experts will create reusable and version-controlled infrastructure definitions, making deployments consistent, repeatable, and easily scalable.
- Infrastructure as Code (IaC): Our team embraces Infrastructure as Code (IaC) methodologies to automate the provisioning and management of your cloud infrastructure. With tools like Azure Resource Manager (ARM) templates, AWS CloudFormation, and GCP Deployment Manager, our experts will create reusable and version-controlled infrastructure definitions, making deployments consistent, repeatable, and easily scalable.
- Cloud Monitoring and Optimization: Monitoring the performance and health of your cloud infrastructure is crucial. Our DevOps team will set up comprehensive monitoring and logging solutions, utilizing Azure Monitor, AWS CloudWatch, GCP Monitoring, and other tools to gain real-time insights into your applications and infrastructure. They will proactively identify bottlenecks, optimize resource utilization, and ensure high availability and scalability.
- Security and Compliance: With a strong focus on security and compliance, our DevOps experts will implement best practices to protect your cloud environment. They will configure robust access controls, implement encryption mechanisms, and perform regular security audits to safeguard your data and applications. Compliance frameworks such as HIPAA, GDPR, and PCI-DSS will be considered to ensure adherence to industry-specific regulations.
- Collaborative and Agile Approach: Our DevOps team believes in collaboration and works seamlessly with your development and operations teams. They follow agile methodologies, fostering open communication, iterative development, and continuous improvement. By aligning with your organization's goals and practices, our experts become an extension of your team, ensuring a smooth and efficient collaboration.

When you hire our DevOps experts, you gain access to a dedicated team with a wealth of cloud knowledge and experience. We offer flexible engagement models tailored to your needs, including project-based assignments, ongoing support, or team augmentation.
Contact us today to discuss your specific requirements, and let our DevOps experts help you unlock the full potential of your cloud infrastructure on Azure, AWS, or GCP. Together, we'll achieve operational excellence, scalability, and cost optimization in the cloud!

## SUCCESS **STORIES**

[**Crestic Migrates 5,000 Servers From 10 Data Centers To AWS In Just 8 Months**](https://www.0scale.io/crestic-case-study.php)

Required to modernize and migrate on AWS. The enormous project involved over 5,000 servers from 10 data centers to AWS in Just 8 Months of timeframe.

[**0scale Develops Custom AWS App To Facilitate Protected, Remote File Access**](https://www.0scale.io/ascd-case-study.php)

ACSD required a way to offer on-site workers protected access to files saved in remote locations.

[**ABR Develops Data Architecture Prototypes for potential Data Lake execution**](https://www.0scale.io/abr-case-study.php)

The ABR wanted to deal with numerous data architecture challenges across its network and build a data lake that incorporated flawlessly with Sales force.

[**Amazon Personalize Allows Retailer To Make Commanding Recommendation Engine**](https://www.0scale.io/flowers-case-study.php)

20Flowers wanted to make a more attractive customer experience by making customized product suggestions via its digital store.

## Frequently Asked **Questions**

#### [How can I get started with AWS Cloud services?](https://www.0scale.io/www.0scale.io\#collapseOne)

Getting started with AWS Cloud services is simple. You can begin by creating an AWS account, which grants you access to a wide range of services. Once your account is set up, you can explore the AWS Management Console, where you can provision and manage various cloud resources. Additionally, AWS provides extensive documentation, tutorials, and online training to help you understand and leverage the full potential of their cloud services.

#### [What are the key benefits of using AWS Cloud services for my business?](https://www.0scale.io/www.0scale.io\#collapseTwo)

AWS Cloud services offer numerous advantages for businesses. Firstly, they provide flexible scalability, allowing you to easily adjust your resources based on demand. This enables cost optimization and prevents overprovisioning. Secondly, AWS offers a robust global infrastructure that ensures high availability and reliability of your applications and data. Additionally, AWS provides a wide range of services, including storage, compute, database, machine learning, and more, allowing you to build and deploy virtually any type of application. Lastly, AWS offers comprehensive security features and compliance certifications to protect your data and ensure regulatory compliance.

#### [How does AWS ensure the security and privacy of my data in the cloud?](https://www.0scale.io/www.0scale.io\#collapseThree)

AWS places a strong emphasis on security and privacy. They employ a multi-layered approach to protect your data. Firstly, AWS infrastructure is built to meet the most stringent security requirements. This includes physical security measures, such as secure data centers, access controls, and surveillance systems. Secondly, AWS provides a wide range of security services and features, such as identity and access management, encryption, network security, and monitoring tools. These enable you to secure your applications and data in the cloud. Additionally, AWS complies with various industry standards and regulations, such as GDPR and HIPAA, and undergoes regular audits to ensure compliance and data privacy.

# Fatih Masaj Yapan Escort Mutluson
Mayıs 20, 2024yazar[operator](https://www.00-design.com/author/operator/)
İstanbul’un tarihi ve kültürel kalbi olan Fatih, sunduğu çeşitli hizmetlerle her zaman dikkat çekmiştir. Bu hizmetler arasında, yorgunluğunuzu ve stresinizi atabileceğiniz masaj hizmetleri de bulunmaktadır. Fatih’te masaj hizmeti sunan eskort Mutluson, bu alanda öne çıkan isimlerden biridir. Bu yazıda, Mutluson’un sunduğu masaj hizmetlerinin detaylarına ve neden tercih edilmesi gerektiğine değineceğiz.
1. **Klasik Masaj**: Geleneksel masaj teknikleri ile vücudunuzdaki gerginlikleri ve ağrıları hafifletir. Bu masaj, kan dolaşımını artırır ve genel olarak daha iyi hissetmenizi sağlar.
2. **Aromaterapi Masajı**: Özel aroma yağları kullanarak yapılan bu masaj, hem bedensel hem de ruhsal rahatlama sunar. Aromaterapi, stres ve kaygıyı azaltmak için etkili bir yöntemdir.
3. **Derin Doku Masajı**: Kaslarınızdaki derin gerginlikleri hedefleyen bu masaj, sporcular ve yoğun fiziksel aktivite yapan kişiler için idealdir. Kas ağrılarını hafifletir ve esnekliği artırır.
4. **Refleksoloji**: Ayaklarınızda belirli noktalara uygulanan basınçla tüm vücudunuzun rahatlamasını sağlayan bu teknik, enerji akışınızı dengeler ve genel sağlık durumunuzu iyileştirir.
5. **Özel Masaj Teknikleri**: Mutluson, müşterilerinin özel ihtiyaçlarına ve isteklerine göre kişiselleştirilmiş masaj hizmetleri sunar. Her seans, müşterinin ihtiyaçlarına göre uyarlanır.
6. **Profesyonellik ve Deneyim**: Mutluson, alanında eğitimli ve deneyimli bir terapisttir. Müşterilerine en iyi hizmeti sunmak için sürekli olarak kendini geliştirir.
7. **Müşteri Odaklı Yaklaşım**: Mutluson, her müşterinin farklı olduğunu bilir ve hizmetlerini bu doğrultuda kişiselleştirir. Müşteri memnuniyetine büyük önem verir.
8. **Hijyen ve Konfor**: Masaj hizmetlerinde hijyen ve konfor en üst düzeyde tutulur. Mutluson, temiz ve rahat bir ortamda hizmet sunarak müşterilerinin kendilerini güvende ve rahat hissetmelerini sağlar.
9. **Gizlilik**: Mutluson, müşterilerinin gizliliğine büyük önem verir. Tüm görüşmeler ve hizmetler, tamamen gizlilik ilkesi çerçevesinde gerçekleştirilir.
Mutluson ile iletişime geçmek ve randevu almak oldukça kolaydır. Telefonla arayarak veya internet üzerinden iletişim kurarak hizmetlerinden yararlanabilirsiniz. Mutluson, her zaman müşteri memnuniyetini ön planda tutarak, en iyi hizmeti sunmayı hedefler.
Fatih’te masaj hizmeti sunan eskort Mutluson, stres ve yorgunluğunuzu atmak için mükemmel bir seçenektir. Profesyonelliği, müşteri odaklı yaklaşımı ve sunduğu çeşitli masaj teknikleri ile Mutluson, size unutulmaz bir rahatlama deneyimi yaşatacaktır. Eğer siz de Fatih’te kaliteli bir masaj hizmeti arıyorsanız, Mutluson ile iletişime geçerek bu özel deneyimi yaşayabilirsiniz.

title: The #1 Destination for Wraps & PPF in Spring, TX | 0-60
text:
Introducing Aatif Mohammed, founder of 0-60, a Texas car modification shop. Born in India, his love for cars led him to a Mechanical Engineering degree and a move to the US, where he worked at Boeing. In Houston, Aatif saw a need for personalized car modifications and started 0-60. His skills have led to standout projects like a McLaren 720 S with over 1000 HP and a 2020 063 conversion. Outside the shop, Aatif enjoys family time and advises pursuing passions, a principle he embodies in his work.

Với công nghệ tiên tiến, giao diện thân thiện và nhiều tính năng độc đáo, sảnh game tại**[123B](https://123b-vn.io/)**hứa hẹn trở thành điểm đến lý tưởng cho mọi game thủ.
Nội Dung Chính

## **Esports 123B Là Gì?**
Esports 123B là một nền tảng cung cấp các dịch vụ và nội dung liên quan đến thể thao điện tử, đáp ứng nhu cầu của cộng đồng game thủ với những người yêu thích eSports trên toàn thế giới. Với sự phát triển của ngành công nghiệp game, Esports nhanh chóng trở thành điểm đến hàng đầu cho ai muốn khám phá, trải nghiệm cập nhật thông tin về các giải đấu, trò chơi và đội tuyển hàng đầu.
### **Tầm quan trọng của Esports**
Esports 123B góp phần thúc đẩy sự phát triển mạnh mẽ của bộ môn này bằng cách kết nối cộng đồng người hâm mộ, cung cấp nền tảng chuyên nghiệp đểtheo dõi, tranh tài giao lưu. Với công nghệ tiên tiến với hệ thống giải đấu đa dạng, sảnh game đang định hình tương lai của thể thao điện tử, tạo ra sân chơi hấp dẫn cho mọi đối tượng đam mê Esports.
![Tầm quan trọng loại hình này](data:image/svg+xml;base64,PHN2ZyB4bWxucz0iaHR0cDovL3d3dy53My5vcmcvMjAwMC9zdmciIHdpZHRoPSI3NTgiIGhlaWdodD0iNDUwIiB2aWV3Qm94PSIwIDAgNzU4IDQ1MCI+PHJlY3Qgd2lkdGg9IjEwMCUiIGhlaWdodD0iMTAwJSIgc3R5bGU9ImZpbGw6I2NmZDRkYjtmaWxsLW9wYWNpdHk6IDAuMTsiLz48L3N2Zz4=)Tầm quan trọng loại hình này### **Các dịch vụ chính của Esports 123B**
Đây không chỉ là một nền tảng thể thao điện tử mà còn cung cấp hệ sinh thái toàn diện, đáp ứng nhu cầu của game thủ và người hâm mộ.
* Cập nhật thông tin giải đấu: Liên tục mang đến tin tức mới nhất về các giải đấu lớn nhỏ trên toàn cầu, từ sự kiện Esports quốc tế đến các giải khu vực, giúp người dùng không bỏ lỡ bất kỳ trận đấu hấp dẫn nào.
* Nền tảng chơi game trực tuyến: Hỗ trợ kết nối game thủ từ khắp nơi, tạo điều kiện đểhọ tranh tài nâng cao kỹ năng trong môi trường chuyên nghiệp.
* Cộng đồng chia sẻ: Xây dựng không gian thảo luận sôi động, nơi người chơi có thể giao lưu, học hỏi kinh nghiệm cập nhật chiến thuật mới nhất trong Esports.## **Các Lợi Ích Khi Sử Dụng**
**[Esports 123B](https://123b-vn.io/esports-123b/)**mang đến nhiều lợi ích đặc biệt cho cả người chơi lẫn người hâm mộ thể thao điện tử từ việc cập nhật tin tức cho đến trải nghiệm game thú vị.
### **Cập nhật tin tức nhanh chóng**
Một trong những lợi thế nổi bật nhất là khả năng cập nhật tin tức nhanh chóng, chính xác, giúp người hâm mộ Esports không bỏ lỡ bất kỳ diễn biến quan trọng nào. Người dùng dễ dàng tìm thấy:
* Kết quả các trận đấu nổi bật với phân tích chi tiết về diễn biến và điểm số.
* Lịch thi đấu đầy đủcủa các giải đấu lớn, giúp người chơi theo dõi và sắp xếp thời gian hợp lý.
* Tin tức chuyển nhượng cập nhật liên tục về những thay đổi đội hình, hợp đồng và chiến lược của các đội tuyển Esports hàng đầu.![Ích lợi khi tham gia](data:image/svg+xml;base64,PHN2ZyB4bWxucz0iaHR0cDovL3d3dy53My5vcmcvMjAwMC9zdmciIHdpZHRoPSI3NTgiIGhlaWdodD0iNDUwIiB2aWV3Qm94PSIwIDAgNzU4IDQ1MCI+PHJlY3Qgd2lkdGg9IjEwMCUiIGhlaWdodD0iMTAwJSIgc3R5bGU9ImZpbGw6I2NmZDRkYjtmaWxsLW9wYWNpdHk6IDAuMTsiLz48L3N2Zz4=)Ích lợi khi tham gia### **Trải nghiệm chơi game đỉnh cao**
Esports 123B không chỉ là kênh thông tin mà còn mang đến nền tảng chơi game trực tuyến hiện đại, giúp game thủ thử sức trong môi trường chuyên nghiệp.
* Tham gia các giải đấu online được tổ chức định kỳ, với nhiều thể loại hấp dẫn và phần thưởng giá trị.

## **Lý Do Nên Chọn Esports 123B**
Với những lợi thế vượt trội về chất lượng dịch vụ, hỗ trợ phát triển sự nghiệp và nội dung đa dạng, sảnh game xứng đáng trở thành lựa chọn hàng đầu trong cộng đồng thể thao điện tử.

### **Đa dạng trò chơi**
Esports 123B mang đến kho nội dung phong phú, bao quát nhiều tựa game đình đám như Liên Minh Huyền Thoại, PUBG, Dota 2, …cùng các trò chơi mới đang thu hút sự quan tâm. title: 10 points to take into consideration when choosing an orthodontist in Piraeus for teeth whitening. Find out more.
text:
10 points to take into consideration when choosing an orthodontist in Piraeus for teeth whitening. Find out more. – Ur.org
[Skip to content](#content)
[Ur.org](https://www.0421ug.org/)
Linux User Group Eastern Veneto
# 10 points to take into consideration when choosing an orthodontist in Piraeus for teeth whitening. Find out more.
1. Qualifications and experience
Orthodontic therapy calls for the abilities and competence of a professional orthodontist in Piraeus ([ορθοδοντικοσ πειραιασ](https://orthodontikosrammos.gr/)). So, if you’re thinking about orthodontic therapy, it is necessary you discover what qualifications and experience your orthodontist has. To begin with they must have a Bachelor of Dentistry adhered to by a Master in Orthodontics. They must also be registered as a specialist orthodontist by the General Dental Council (check to see they have a GDC number) and be a member of professional bodies, such as the British Orthodontic Society.
2. Assistance team
While an[orthodontist in Piraeus](https://orthodontikospeiraias.wordpress.com/)is accountable for your total therapy plan, they do not work alone. Instead, they are bordered by a team of professionals, from orthodontic specialists to oral registered nurses, treatment co-ordinators to hygienists. Each play an essential role in your orthodontic therapy journey. For that reason, it is recommended to take some time to find out what credentials and experience the group has and that will be involved in your treatment.
3. Therapy alternatives in Piraeus
Developments in orthodontic modern technology indicates there is a range of therapy methods available. They may not all appropriate for your case, but you can find out which ones you can gain from at a first appointment before beginning treatment. However, prior to reserving an assessment, take a look at your orthodontic method’s site to find out what therapies get on deal. This will certainly allow you to ask informed inquiries of your treatment alternatives when the possibility occurs.
4. Previous work
Discovering an orthodontist in Piraeus that works close to where you live or work is absolutely practical when it concerns booking consultations however inspect to see if the quality of their treatment is what you are trying to find. You can do this by taking a look at prior to and after photos of previous cases they have dealt with. A lot of orthodontists will certainly display these on their website, along with patient testimonials, but otherwise, ask for them at function.
5. Market acknowledgment
Is your orthodontic technique an industry-recognised service provider of the therapies they use? Inspect the technique internet site for sector logos as this is an indicator of acknowledgment and professional participants. (If you can’t see any kind of, ask). For example, if you are interested in Invisalign therapy, check to see what condition your orthodontist and his/her technique holds.
6. Expense and finance
Orthodontic therapy is a substantial monetary investment but most orthodontists comprehend this and give layaway plan to assist with the expense. Prior to you embark on therapy, see to it you have a complete quote which information all fees included. This need to likewise include retention post-treatment. Numerous orthodontists provide some first expenses on their website but remember, every instance is special, including your own, so make sure to decide based upon the expense for your treatment.
7. Assessments
Starting orthodontic therapy in Piraeus isn’t a choice to be made lightly. Along with the total cost, the impact treatment can carry your lifestyle ought to likewise be considered, though nowadays, thanks to advancements in orthodontic technology, these are minimal. However, it’s important you are completely informed before making your decision. The majority of orthodontists will provide a FREE appointment, during which they’ll evaluate your medical history, speak to you regarding your therapy purposes, analyze your orthodontic needs, take photos and x-rays and offer you with a therapy strategy, which will consist of a suggestion on the sort of treatment you can most gain from, in addition to the price and duration.
8. At home and post-treatment treatment
While undertaking orthodontic treatment, you’ll have regular consultations with your orthodontist (about every eight weeks), in addition to your common appointments with your dentist. Nevertheless, in between times, you wish to know that in the not likely event you have difficulty with your appliance, help and support is there. It’s additionally essential to receive help and support post-treatment too. Retention is an essential stage of your orthodontic treatment trip as this aids to keep your teeth ready once your home appliance has actually been removed. Make certain retention is consisted of in your therapy strategy and expense.
9. Relationships with dental practitioners
Although you will be under the care of a professional orthodontist throughout your treatment, your dental expert also needs to be maintained informed. Figure out what the connection is between your orthodontist and your dental practitioner. It ought to be among open interaction, and they should be collaborating to guarantee you get the best therapy possible. While your orthodontist will be in charge of your home appliance, your dental expert will certainly continue to be responsible for your total oral health, so both will certainly be involved with your treatment.
10. Center setting
On average, orthodontic therapy lasts between 12 and 24 months. This is a practical length of time to be going to visits so you wish to be comfortable and kicked back in the facility. If your orthodontist offers a totally free consultation, along with getting information on your therapy options, this is also a possibility for you to get a preference of the practice. Are you comfortably welcomed by reception? Do you really feel comfortable in the center? Are the team pleasant and approachable? Make certain the facility is a place you more than happy to hang out in and a place where you really feel sustained.
Laser Pearly Whites Whitening: Accuracy and Speed
Laser teeth bleaching remains at the leading edge of oral aesthetic modern technology, supplying quick outcomes with a high degree of accuracy. This approach involves applying a whitening agent to the teeth, which is then turned on by a laser. The laser increases the lightening process, breaking down stains swiftly and properly. In 2024, innovations in laser innovation have made this procedure much more reliable, decreasing therapy time and enhancing convenience. With improved laser accuracy, dental experts can target staining with very little effect on surrounding tissues, making certain a safer lightening experience. For a consider the benefits and drawbacks of laser teeth lightening, describe this post from Healthline.
LED-Activated Lightening: The Power of Light
LED-activated bleaching systems ([λευκανση δοντιων](https://orthodontikosrammos.gr/ipiresies/leukansi-dontion/)) have actually obtained substantial traction in 2024, thanks to their performance and non-invasive nature. This technique makes use of a trendy, blue LED light to turn on the whitening agent applied to the teeth, quickening the procedure of breaking down discolorations. The latest LED systems supply flexible wavelengths and strengths, permitting customized therapies that cater to private level of sensitivity levels and bleaching needs. This personalization not just takes full advantage of effectiveness but likewise reduces possible pain, making it a popular option among clients seeking a balance in between outcomes and comfort. A number of companies currently use LED lightening packages like this one from Colgate.
Tailor-made Bleaching Trays: Personalized Benefit
The development of tailor-made lightening trays in 2024 has actually brought professional teeth whitening right into the convenience of home without compromising on specialist oversight. Dental practitioners currently make use of electronic scans to develop perfectly fitting trays, guaranteeing even application of the lightening gel and lowering the danger of gum tissue inflammation. This individualized strategy not only improves security and efficiency yet likewise offers the ease of home treatment with professional-grade outcomes. The most up to date gels utilized in these trays are formulated to lessen level of sensitivity, making this method ideal for a bigger series of clients.
Natural and Organic Whitening: A Greener Method
Showing the growing need for natural and sustainable medical care options, 2024 has actually seen the surge of natural and organic teeth lightening options in specialist settings. These approaches make use of bio-based whitening agents, such as specific fruit enzymes and triggered charcoal, offering a gentler choice to conventional chemicals. While not as instantly significant as laser or LED techniques, natural lightening techniques interest health-conscious customers trying to find green and holistic dental care options.
Security First: Ensuring a Safe Smile
The emphasis on safety in specialist teeth lightening has actually never been a lot more noticable. In 2024, dental experts are equipped with sophisticated analysis devices to examine the viability of lightening therapies for each and every individual, thinking about elements like enamel density, gum tissue health and wellness, and existing dental job. Pre-treatment assessments and post-treatment treatment protocols have actually come to be extra strenuous, ensuring that people not only attain their wanted results but do so without compromising their oral health.
Looking Ahead: The Future of Teeth Lightening
As we look beyond 2024, the future of specialist teeth bleaching guarantees much more exciting advancements. Developments in nanotechnology and bio-materials are anticipated to introduce brand-new whitening agents that can attain longer-lasting results without harming the tooth enamel. In addition, the integration of AI and machine learning in dental techniques will certainly further customize and enhance whitening therapies, making them extra efficient and tailored to private needs.

title: CICD - 01Cloud
text:
[Skip to content](https://dev-docs.01cloud.io/dev-docs.01cloud.io#cicd)

# CICD

## Introduction

Continuous integration (CI) and continuous delivery (CD) embody our 01Cloud platform workflow, set of operating principles,
and collection of practices that enable the application development teams to deliver code changes more frequently and reliably.

The 01cloud CI/CD is a powerful tool that leverages Tekton manifests to provide built-in CI/CD capabilities. It dynamically applies YAML files found in a `.01cloud` folder within your Git repository, configuring tasks, pipelines, persistent volume claims (PVCs), secrets, configmaps, and pipelineruns.
This documentation will guide you through the setup and usage of 01Cloud CI/CD.

## Prerequisites

Before getting started, ensure you have the following prerequisites:

- An 01Cloud account.
- Import to a Kubernetes cluster.

## Installation

Tekton Pipelines package installed on the Kubernetes cluster.

## Usage

There is no separate installation process for the 01Cloud CI/CD, as it operates based on the presence of a `.01cloud` folder in your Git repository.

01. **Git Repository Configuration**

02. Ensure your Git repository contains a `.01cloud` folder at the root level.

03. Within this folder, place the necessary YAML files for tasks, pipelines, PVCs, secrets, configmaps, and pipelineruns.

04. **Pipeline Execution**

05. When changes are pushed to your Git repository, the CI/CD process is triggered automatically.

06. The CI/CD runner reads the YAML files within the `.01cloud` folder and applies them dynamically.
07. The pipeline process starts, including task execution.

08. **Healing and Failure Handling**

09. The CI/CD runner continuously monitors the pipeline process.

10. If everything proceeds without errors, the pipeline is marked as successful.
11. In case of any issues or failures at any step, the pipeline is marked as failed.

12. **Viewing Pipeline Details**

13. You can access the 01cloud UI to visualize the CI/CD process.

14. In the UI, you will see details of each task, including their names and real-time logs for each step.

## Customization

You have the flexibility to customize your CI/CD process by creating or modifying YAML files within the `.01cloud` folder. Refer to Tekton Pipelines documentation for details on defining tasks, pipelines, and other resources.

## Conclusion

The 01cloud CI/CD Runner simplifies and automates your CI/CD process by dynamically applying Tekton manifests from your Git repository. It provides real-time visibility into your pipeline's progress and helps maintain a reliable CI/CD workflow.

For more advanced usage and troubleshooting, refer to the 01cloud and Tekton Pipelines documentation.

## References

- [01cloud Documentation](https://01cloud.io/docs)
- [Tekton Pipelines Documentation](https://tekton.dev/docs/)

Back to top

title: Sample Page
text:
Sample Page – 033ys[Skip to content](#content)
[033ys](https://033ys.org/)
# Sample Page
This is an example page. It’s different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
> Hi there! I’m a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin’ caught in the rain.)
…or something like this:
> The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to[your dashboard](https://033ys.org/wp-admin/)to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

| You have arrived at the [0-hr.com](https://0-hr.com/index.htm) poster & miniature shop! These are deluxe starship posters and miniatures produced through [_my Kickstarter campaigns_](https://www.kickstarter.com/profile/0-hr/created). Digital versions and documents are at [DriveThruRPG](https://www.drivethrurpg.com/browse/pub/606/0hr).![line](https://0-hr.com/Graphics/Bar_b.jpg) Miniatures are cast or 3D printed resin models. [Ship scale](https://0-hr.com/Shop/Pic/Scale.jpg) ranges between 0.5 and 5 inches long. A one-inch round, black, single-piece flight stand with a tapered post is included with each ship that requires one. The older (clear, hex, 2-piece) stands from Litko.net can be substituted upon request. Ships are not painted. # 他与tpwallet：在链与链之间织就支付的脉络
他把手机放在茶杯旁，屏幕亮起的是tpwallet的主界面：一串交易历史像心电图般跳动。作为早期用户与偶尔的技术审计者，他常以人的尺度审视这套钱包——不是把它当成工具，而是把它当成会呼吸的金融机体。
在他眼里，高效支付管理不是单纯的速度竞赛，而是流量与成本的平衡术。tpwallet通过支付通道与批量结算把微支付从链上拉到链下，再以签名聚合与Gas抽象把体验https://www.yslcj.com ,与手续费分离，用户几乎看不到确认的等待，只感到资金的即时流动。
技术解读时，他会指着架构图说：核心是模块化账户和轻客户端，阈值签名与MPC守护私钥，WASM运行时承载智能插件，允许策略在本地执行。账户抽象把身份与策略耦合，代替了僵化的公私钥模型，使自动化支付、限额与恢复成为钱包原生能力。
链间通信在他口中变成了“跨界对话”。tpwallet兼容多种跨链协议：基于中继的状态证明、乐观桥的延迟挑战机制与零知识证明的即时信任。它以交易中继器和轻客户端验证器作为桥梁，既避免了单点托管的风险，又保留了可审计的链上结算路径。
账户监控并非冷冰冰的数据推送，而是有温度的守护。实时风险评分、异常签名检测、多维度资产快照与合规策略共同构成了预警体系。他曾因此在凌晨拦截过一次异常代币转移——那一刻，钱包像一位沉着的守门人。关于代币增发，他看到的是微观激励与宏观治理的对话。tpwallet支持可编程增发：通胀周期、锁仓释放与回购销毁并行，用链上治理把发行逻辑与社区共识连成闭环。这既是对通货膨胀风险的技术回应，也是平台激励的制度设计。
![](https://www.0-002.com/rimg/bkvyg3xjd6.jpg)
![](https://www.0-002.com/rimg/7jmyu226hx.jpg)
当他合上手机，心中并非对技术的崇拜，而是一种谨慎的乐观：tpwallet凭借强大的加密基座、灵活的链间通信和细腻的账户治理，把钱包从“钥匙”转变为“信任的运行时”。未来在模块化扩展与隐私计算下，这样的机体会更像银行的影子——无形却不可或缺。

# TP钱包深度调查：从状态通道到ERC721，构建高效且可推广的加密交易生态
![](https://0-002.com/rimg/1yo6zr9w7x.jpg)
导语：本调查报告旨在评估TP钱包在链下扩展、加密交易与资产管理上的技术能力，并提出可执行的推广路径。研究覆盖状态通道、高效交易系统、加密交易流程、安全监控机制、ERC721与期权协议的集成，以及货币转移的全流程分析。
核心发现与技术透视：TP钱包通过状态通道降低链上结算频次，显著提升TPS与用户体验。结合高效交易系统（内存池优化、交易打包与优先队列），可实现近即时确认感知。对ERC721的支持为NFT交互和二级市场带来流动性，而期权协议的集成则为衍生品和对冲策略打开入口。
详细流程分析：1) 用户Onboardihttps://www.shtyzy.com ,ng：私钥生成、助记词安全提示、链上地址映射；2) 状态通道建立：双方签署多重签名或智能合约锁定资金，启动通道；3) 链下加密交易：交易在本地签名并通过P2P或中继传递，钱包维护交易快照与版本号；4) 安全监控与回滚：异常检测模块实时比对签名序列，发现分叉或欺诈则触发挑战期并同步链上仲裁；5) ERC721交互与期权执行：NFT转移走通道内的所有权证明，期权协议通过时间锁与或权利表征实现自动执行；6) 结算与货币转移：当通道关闭或触发结算，最终状态上链，智能合约完成资产清算与代币转移。风险与治理：关键风险点在密钥管理、挑战期内的延迟响应、以及跨合约的重入攻击。建议部署多层安全监控：行为分析、链上/链下一致性校验、阈值签名与硬件钱包兼容性。同时为期权与NFT操作设立延时窗口与多签审计以压缩攻击面。
![](https://0-002.com/rimg/qq0vkb2ykx.jpg)
推广建议（TP钱包推广落地）：以“高频低费、NFT+期权一站式”为核心卖点，面向交易者、NFT社群与DeFi用户制定场景化campaign。技术层面开放API与SDK，强调状态通道带来的即时结算体验；产品侧推出期权教育与NFT质押活动，配合安全审计与保险合作提升信任度。
结论：TP钱包若能将状态通道与高效交易系统的技术优势与ERC721、期权协议的产品场景结合，再辅以严密的安全监控与透明治理，既能满足高并发交易需求，也能创造新的用户增长曲线。下一步应以可量化的KPI（交易确认时延、通道成功率、异常响应时间）衡量推广效果，并通过持续安全迭代巩固市场地位。

title: 张杰视角下的老婆谢娜 坐在车中向往窗外
text:
张杰视角下的老婆谢娜 坐在车中向往窗外\_明星\_美女娱乐网# [](http://0245.org/edu1765126032.982/index.asp)[](http://0245.org/edu1765126032.982/index.html)[](http://0245.org/edu1765126032.982/index.shtml)
[美女娱乐网](http://www.0245.org/)[移动客户端](http://m.0245.org)[网站地图xml](http://www.0245.org/sp.xml)[网站地图html](http://www.0245.org/sp.html)
[![美女娱乐网](http://0245.org/skins/images/logo.png)](http://0245.org/)
* [时尚](http://www.0245.org/shishang/)
* [美容](http://www.0245.org/meirong/)
* [美体](http://www.0245.org/meiti/)
* [健康](http://www.0245.org/jiankang/)
* [情感](http://www.0245.org/qinggan/)
* [婚嫁](http://www.0245.org/hunjia/)
* [亲子](http://www.0245.org/qinzi/)
* [娱乐](http://www.0245.org/yule/)
* [星座](http://www.0245.org/xingzuo/)
* [社会热点](http://www.0245.org/xinwen/)
* [图库](http://www.0245.org/tuku/)
**[首页](http://www.0245.org/)[美女娱乐网](http://www.0245.org//)\>[星座](http://0245.org/xingzuo/)\>[星座事件](http://0245.org/xingzuo/xzsj/)\>[明星](http://0245.org/xingzuo/xzsj/mingxing/)\> 张杰视角下的老婆谢娜# 张杰视角下的老婆谢娜坐在车中向往窗外时间：2018-03-03 17:33编辑：美女娱乐网关键词：张杰视角下的老婆谢娜
下面这张图是谁呢？包得这么严实？哦，原来是[谢娜娜姐](http://www.0245.org/xinwen/)，这个镜头是张杰带谢娜外出的时候，抓拍吧，
谢娜[微博]微博发文：“他说抓拍这张照片看出我对外面世界的向往。”
谢娜晒出张杰[微博]为自己拍的照片，照片中，谢娜坐在车里，戴着毛绒帽子，手指向车窗外，一副憧憬的样子。
网友表示，“哈哈哈，那你感受到了我们对你九宫格自拍的向往了么。”“期待娜姐回快乐大本营！”
![](http://0245.org/uploads/allimg/180303/1K325A04-0.jpg)
标签：**
[![凌潇肃唐一菲有了二胎](http://0245.org/uploads/allimg/181106/212440D10-0-lp.jpg)](http://0245.org/xingzuo/xzsj/mingxing/155865.html)### [凌潇肃唐一菲有了二胎](http://0245.org/xingzuo/xzsj/mingxing/155865.html)
6日，凌潇肃发文宣布喜得二胎，他还晒出了妻子唐一菲的B超照，而超声波是今年9月拍摄的，宝宝很快就会出生，恭喜！[[详情]](http://0245.org/xingzuo/xzsj/mingxing/155865.html)
[![年底完婚？景甜方辟谣：假的，拍戏没有时间](http://0245.org/uploads/allimg/180718/1410354040-0-lp.jpg)](http://0245.org/xingzuo/xzsj/mingxing/154369.html)### [年底完婚？景甜方辟谣：假的，拍戏没有时间](http://0245.org/xingzuo/xzsj/mingxing/154369.html)
近日，有网友曝景甜张继科已登记结婚，女方生日当天或晒结婚证，有望年底完婚。对此，有媒体向工作人员确认该消息，对方回复是谣传。[[详情]](http://0245.org/xingzuo/xzsj/mingxing/154369.html)

[![王大治携妻女祈福 一家三口温馨十足](http://0245.org/uploads/allimg/180703/1P92aE1-0-lp.jpg)](http://0245.org/xingzuo/xzsj/mingxing/154022.html)### [王大治携妻女祈福 一家三口温馨十足](http://0245.org/xingzuo/xzsj/mingxing/154022.html)

梅婷虽然是老戏骨，但听过的人可能不多，但如果小时候看过电视剧《不要和陌生人说话》，那么一定会给我们留下深刻童年阴影，而这部剧也回加速了反家暴法的到来。不过今天小编要说的是梅老师，在这一期的《声临其境》为唐山大地震配音，为了还原当时情景，她[[详情]](http://0245.org/xingzuo/xzsj/mingxing/152502.html)
[![萌妹纸郑爽新搭档曝光！网友：是哪位新搭档？](http://0245.org/uploads/allimg/180306/134Z21145-0-lp.jpg)](http://0245.org/xingzuo/xzsj/mingxing/152501.html)### [萌妹纸郑爽新搭档曝光！网友：是哪位新搭档？](http://0245.org/xingzuo/xzsj/mingxing/152501.html)
在演艺圈，不同的时期，有不同的获得过不同的称号，比如以前的四大天王，而如今内地的当红四小花旦，大家知道是谁吗？很多网友不加思索就可以叫出来：“赵丽颖、迪丽热巴、李沁、郑爽”，前面两位大家都非常熟悉，名气也特别大，而郑爽这段时间没怎么冒出来[[详情]](http://0245.org/xingzuo/xzsj/mingxing/152501.html)
[![张杰视角下的老婆谢娜 坐在车中向往窗外](http://0245.org/uploads/allimg/180303/1K325A04-0-lp.jpg)](http://0245.org/xingzuo/xzsj/mingxing/152460.html)### [张杰视角下的老婆谢娜 坐在车中向往窗外](http://0245.org/xingzuo/xzsj/mingxing/152460.html)

前不久，张翰生日，小编在微博上看到，古力娜扎可能是太忙，不过就算是到了凌晨，还发微博祝福，虽说他俩现在分手了，但感情还是不错的。不过小编往下看的时候，下面的评论怎么全是郑爽呢，这是什么情况嘛！[[详情]](http://0245.org/xingzuo/xzsj/mingxing/152436.html)

[quotes](http://www.0509.org/blog/2005/tag:quotes)
»Vor kurzem sagt der Ratzinger, was ist sexuell heut Sache,
Vögln, sagt er, darf ich nur, wenn ich ein Kind wem mache.
Aber sakra, sag ich, Ratzl-Spatzl, is das denn dein Ernst,
Wenn du das so selten machst, is's klar, daß du das nie lernst.«
Georg Ringsgwandl - »[Sepp](#)« aus »[Der Gaudibursch vom Hindukusch](http://ringsgwandl.com/release/der-gaudibursch-vom-hindukusch)« 1996

[![](images/more_38.jpg)](index.html)>抓姦案例
![](images/news03.jpg)
捉姦機無死角業者送法辦！【聯合晚報/記者楊正海/台北報導】 2009.08.07
國內徵信業者跟監手法無孔不入，卻幾乎都違法；最近接連幾起案例，業者使用目前最夯的「抓姦機」或衛星定位追蹤器(GPS)「捉猴」，均被警方依涉嫌妨害祕密和電信法移送法辦，若警方認真取締，徵信社、私家偵探將很難生存。
日前高雄市一家徵信業者，涉嫌裝設GPS，替客戶非法跟監，結果反被台北市刑警大隊逮捕，查扣裝在機車、汽車上的非法跟監器材，手頭上的兩件「抓猴」案件也破功報銷。
刑事局也曾破獲由徵信業者、販售器材的電信行組成的違法監聽集團，查扣上百組俗稱「抓姦機」的GSM監聽器，此款監聽器裝入SIM卡，透過撥打門號，監聽器即無聲開啟，收錄講話和周遭聲音。
很多徵信業者都用這套系統「抓猴」，也有夫妻用此監聽另一半，卻發現仍有「死角」，光收錄聲音，卻不知偷腥的地點，常常無功而返。監聽器推陳出新無死角警方日前也查獲網路上號稱「最新版抓姦機」，內建GPS衛星定位追蹤器，只有香菸盒大小，塞在汽車空隙、隨身皮箱，不易被察覺，枕邊人若偷腥，另一半只要撥打追蹤器上的電話門號，不只能聽到談話內容，還能馬上追蹤定位，很容易抓姦在床。
這種新型追蹤器，售價要1萬元上下，因未通過NCC認證，警方將販售的業者依違反電信法罪嫌法辦，此外，使用該器材監聽，涉嫌妨害祕密，一併偵辦。
其實，警方指出，自從立法院通過刑法妨害秘密罪條文，明定以各種電子光學儀器窺視、竊聽、竊錄他人隱私活動，可處3年以下徒刑，幾乎等於限制目前國內徵信社的所有跟監行動，尤其是「捉猴」。
業者遊走法律邊緣無法罰過去，沒有明訂相關法律，徵信業者還可以游走法律邊緣，以早年的竊聽手法為例，只要不是侵入民宅或破壞電信箱被當場「抓包」，似乎無「法」可罰，暗中跟監照相、錄影，甚至使用針孔攝影機，更是普遍。據了解，刑法新增妨害祕密罪條文，警方對於徵信業者沒有「趕盡殺絕」，甚至對於無法取得監聽票、搜索票的對象，私下還請徵信業者幫忙跟監，直到總統馬英九視察刑事局通訊監察中心時，公開宣示強力打擊非法監聽，組成「打擊坊間非法竊聽專案小組」，警方才動起來。模糊地帶警睜隻眼閉隻眼一名警官指出，徵信業者目前還能喘口氣，主因是違反電信法、妨害祕密罪大多未列入績效評比，若警方認真辦，業者生計勢必大受影響。[上一頁](news11.html)|[返回列表](news.html)|[下一頁](news13.html)

title: いまさら、ブログを始める
text:
いまさら、ブログを始める - 乱反射ログ![カバー画像](https://blog.0m1.io/icon.svg)
[乱反射ログ](https://blog.0m1.io/)
# いまさら、ブログを始める2023-09-09
[misc](https://blog.0m1.io/posts/tag/misc)
## [目次](#目次)
[目次](#目次)[TL;DR](#TL;DR)[いまさら始めた理由](#いまさら始めた理由)[CMSの選定](#CMSの選定)[このブログの立ち位置](#このブログの立ち位置)
## [TL;DR](#TL;DR)
ブログを開設してみた。* プログラミング関連の技術* 読んだ本* 調べたこと、考えたことなどについて残していく場にしようかなと思ってる。## [いまさら始めた理由](#いまさら始めた理由)
以前から「自分のアウトプットについて、話したり宣伝したりする場があった方がいいな」と思いつつも面倒なので行動には移せていなかった。しかしながら、X (旧Twitter) にライフログとしての役目を期待することが難しくなったことや、日本語を書く練習をした方がいいなと思ったことから、とりあえず小さく始めてみようと思い至ってこのタイミングで作ってみることにした。## [CMSの選定](#CMSの選定)
いまは[otoyo/astro-notion-blog](https://github.com/otoyo/astro-notion-blog)を試してみてる。
読書ログや技術メモといった雑多なことを書くにはZenn、note、Mediumあたりは向いていない印象があり、適当なプラットフォームが見つからなかったので既存のサービスを使うことは早々に候補から外してJamstackにしようと決めた。
最後まで候補に残ったのがmicroCMS + Astroの組み合わせ。microCMSはwebhookサポートがあるためcloudflare pagesにデプロイが容易であったり、設計の自由度が高いといった点がメリット。しかし、リッチエディタで書くのがしっくりこなかったり、ある程度自分でつくり込まないといけない点で面倒な印象も受けた。
astro-notion-blogはすでにデザイン等がある程度固まってて、気になったところをカスタマイズするだけですぐ使える点が気にいった。普段メモ書きに使ってるNotionをそのままブログに使えるのもいい感じ。現時点ではデプロイは面倒だけど、Notionのロードマップにはwebhook対応の計画があるようなので期待。
## [このブログの立ち位置](#このブログの立ち位置)
昔やっていたブログは微妙にカマそうという意識がありうまくいかなかった。今回は「毎日やる」とか「長く続ける」などを目標に置くのではなく、「アウトプットできる場を維持する」みたいな気持ちでやっていけたらいいなと思ってる。あと、あくまで備忘録であることを意識するために「です・ます」調は使わないようにしたい。### 同じカテゴリの投稿コンテンツがありません### ピン留めされた投稿* [いまさら、ブログを始める](https://blog.0m1.io/posts/started-a-new-blog)
### 最新の投稿* [2024年7月に購入したもの](https://blog.0m1.io/posts/2024-07-purchases)
* [2024年6月に購入したもの](https://blog.0m1.io/posts/2024-06-purchases)
* [[textlint] 漢字を「ひらく」ためのtexlintルールを作った](https://blog.0m1.io/posts/about-textlint-rule-ja-hiraku)
* [[rails] scenicのviewの更新を簡単にするgemを作った](https://blog.0m1.io/posts/about-scenic-cascade)
* [[nostr] 虚無リレー始めませんか？](https://blog.0m1.io/posts/welcome-to-nostr-noop-relay)
### カテゴリ別* [book](https://blog.0m1.io/posts/tag/book)

title: 明星没整容的最好证明方式，只要看看父母年轻时的合影就行
text:
明星没整容的最好证明方式，只要看看父母年轻时的合影就行-美女娱乐网# [](http://m.0245.org/edu1765126032.980/index.asp)[](http://m.0245.org/edu1765126032.980/index.html)[](http://m.0245.org/edu1765126032.980/index.shtml)
[![](http://m.0245.org/templets/0245/touch/images/back.png)](javascript:history.go(-1);)
[美女娱乐网](http://m.0245.org/)·女性网络
[![](http://m.0245.org/templets/0245/touch/images/menu.png)](javascript:void(0);)
所有栏目![](http://m.0245.org/templets/0245/touch/images/32.png)
[首页](http://m.0245.org/)[时尚](http://m.0245.org/shishang/)[美容](http://m.0245.org/meirong/)[美体](http://m.0245.org/meiti/)[健康](http://m.0245.org/jiankang/)[情感](http://m.0245.org/qinggan/)[婚嫁](http://m.0245.org/hunjia/)[亲子](http://m.0245.org/qinzi/)[娱乐](http://m.0245.org/yule/)[星座](http://m.0245.org/xingzuo/)[社会热点](http://m.0245.org/xinwen/)[图库](http://m.0245.org/tuku/)
# 明星没整容的最好证明方式，只要看看父母年轻时的合影就行2018-03-11*来源：美女娱乐网*
现在的明星，动不动就整容，在[娱乐圈](http://www.0245.org/shishang/)时不时就会听到哪位女星又变脸了，还有些明星非要拿下时候的照片来对比，证明自己小时候就是一个小美人，不过有句话叫做“女大十八变”。就说[杨幂](http://www.0245.org/meirong/)吧，小时候超级可爱，现在的颜值也没得说，但她少女时期可是四方脸，小眼睛的哦！
![明星最有力证明没整容的方式，不是童年照，而是父母合影](http://m.0245.org/uploads/allimg/180311/140QI005-0.jpg)
出道以来常年饱受整容传闻的Angelababy就使用了非常聪明的一招。
14年母亲节时，baby也跟风晒出了父母年轻时的照片，像是在暗示自己的颜值都遗传了父母。这下果然引得网友惊呼：“爸妈原来都是男神女神！”
![明星最有力证明没整容的方式，不是童年照，而是父母合影](http://m.0245.org/uploads/allimg/180311/140QG521-1.jpg)
15年初baby更是在微博中首度晒出与家人合影，很明显弟弟也有baby前期的凸嘴问题。
现在比少女时期眼睛更大、鼻子更挺、连嘴唇都变薄了，实在不能让人相信仅仅靠箍牙就能实现。然而依然有大票粉丝认为““基因真的很重要，不是整容能做到的。””
![明星最有力证明没整容的方式，不是童年照，而是父母合影](http://m.0245.org/uploads/allimg/180311/140QJ941-2.jpg)
““神仙姐姐””刘亦菲才算是公认的天然美女吧。
14岁出演《金粉世家》， 18岁就成了金庸钦点的小龙女。
清丽脱俗的她却从小被各种谣言缠身，宋祖德更直指刘亦菲变性、整容。拍摄《仙剑》时就流出母亲在剧组照顾刘亦菲的照片，不得感叹妈妈本身也十分漂亮，五官秀气。![明星最有力证明没整容的方式，不是童年照，而是父母合影](http://m.0245.org/uploads/allimg/180311/140QII0-3.jpg)
刘晓莉曾是舞蹈演员出身，肤白貌美，气质淡雅，神似现在的““奶茶妹妹””。
![明星最有力证明没整容的方式，不是童年照，而是父母合影](http://m.0245.org/uploads/allimg/180311/140QH5Q-4.jpg)
刘亦菲一家人的照片更是美哭，全是浓眉大眼瓜子脸，根本就是仙女级别啊！怪不得刘亦菲说自己是全家最丑，这神一般的基因，墙都不扶了就服你！![明星最有力证明没整容的方式，不是童年照，而是父母合影](http://m.0245.org/uploads/allimg/180311/140QI493-5.jpg)
离开王思聪的张予曦大概是立志要从网红之路晋升到演员的行列，在搭档Mike的电视剧中的确像个精致的小公主。
之前也被人扒出丑照，参加瑞丽比赛时明显脸型稍圆、眼睛细长，现在也没能逃出网红脸的诟病。![明星最有力证明没整容的方式，不是童年照，而是父母合影](http://m.0245.org/uploads/allimg/180311/140QL034-6.jpg)
前不久张予曦在微博晒出分别与爸爸妈妈的合照，一家人颜值都在线，可以看出跟妈妈更像。妈妈也是双眼皮大眼睛、五官立体，看上去还很年轻，有网友称赞母女俩神似姐妹花。张予曦也是想借宠爱父母的机会顺便洗刷整容的传言吧。![明星最有力证明没整容的方式，不是童年照，而是父母合影](http://m.0245.org/uploads/allimg/180311/140QK2L-7.jpg)
想必大家都被一张胡歌中学时期的合照惊艳过吧？站在同学中的少年胡歌可以说是光芒四射了。直到父亲生日时，老胡晒出一张合照以及父亲年轻时的照片，不得不感慨基因的强大，一模一样帅！我们老胡还需要整容吗？![明星最有力证明没整容的方式，不是童年照，而是父母合影](http://m.0245.org/uploads/allimg/180311/140QM108-8.jpg)
从金锁到强势美艳的范爷，整容的声音也一直从未听过。虽然冰冰也去做了整容鉴定，但还是不及晒出父母的合照给力。母亲节时冰冰也在微博上传了父母年轻时的合照，感觉冰冰的脸型更像妈妈，鼻子更像爸爸，总之就是神一般综合了两人的优点。![明星最有力证明没整容的方式，不是童年照，而是父母合影](http://m.0245.org/uploads/allimg/180311/140QI096-9.jpg)
17年冰冰更是和爸爸一起登上了北京卫视春晚，Word天，这也太年轻了吧！
不说这是66岁的父亲，都会以为这更像男友呢！而且冰冰和爸爸的眉目简直如出一辙，两人的逆天颜值让网友感叹难怪范爷基因这么强大。
![明星最有力证明没整容的方式，不是童年照，而是父母合影](http://m.0245.org/uploads/allimg/180311/140QIP5-10.jpg)
其实吧整容也不是什么见怪不怪的事了，能利用现代医学手段让自己更美更自信不是很好吗？又没吃你家的饭，像爽妹子就可以大胆承认自己去整容。其实小编也觉得整容也没什么大不了的，因为大多数明星都是靠一张脸吃饭的，不过如果是纯天然的美，那就更好了，因为那样会更自然，更有活力！原创：美女娱乐：www.0245.org

](http://m.0245.org/plus/view.php?aid=152726)[![](http://m.0245.org/uploads/allimg/180327/16124Q0O-0-lp.jpg)### 胡杏儿的胯宽得快撑破裙子，网友：怪不得能生儿子](http://m.0245.org/shishang/nxwl/152725.html)[![](http://m.0245.org/uploads/allimg/180311/140QI005-0-lp.jpg)### 明星没整容的最好证明方式，只要看看父母年轻时的合影就行](http://m.0245.org/shishang/nxwl/152567.html)[![](http://m.0245.org/uploads/allimg/180304/193P34339-0-lp.jpg)### 赵本山女儿球球在直播间跟她老妈互动, ”大谈择偶标准“](http://m.0245.org/shishang/nxwl/152493.html)[![](http://m.0245.org/uploads/allimg/180225/21055Q622-0-lp.jpg)### 刘涛人设崩塌，欺负助理，网友：滚出娱乐圈！](http://m.0245.org/shishang/nxwl/152365.html)

title: 社会人の基本です。
text:
乗り物や会議室での席順マナー
* [乗り物や会議室での席順マナー](http://0-4life.net/)
* [![メニュー](img/icon/icon_menu.svg)](javascript:void(0))
[![閉じる](img/icon/icon_close.svg)](javascript:void(0))
![乗り物や会議室での席順マナーメインビジュアル](img/top/main.jpg)
# 社会人の基本です。社会に出ると、様々なマナーを身につけなくてはならなくなります。目上の人に敬語を使うのはもちろんのこと、会議などの際に座る場所も役職順で決まっています。基本的に「上座」と呼ばれる側は役職の上の人、もしくはお客様の席です。事前に席次表などが分かっている場合は全く問題がありませんが、知らないで過ごしていると大きなミスを犯すこともあります。知らなかったでは済まされない場面も多く存在するので、事前に覚えておく必要があります。お茶を出す際も上座の方から順番に出さなくてはいけません。場合によっては上座から順に座っていないこともあるので臨機応変に対応することも大切です。基本的な事を知っておけば、スムーズに席へ案内もしやすくなります。スムーズに案内ができると社内での評価も上がるでしょう。![会議](img/top/top_01.jpg)
* [テレブース・WEB会議ブースならアイ・スペース](https://www.ispace-itsuki.com/)
オープンオフィスでも集中環境を確保できるアイ・スペース。防音機能も優れているのでワークブース、フォンブースとして幅広く活用できます。https://www.ispace-itsuki.com/
## 会議室における席順ビジネスにおいて会議室内や移動用の車内における席次や席順は、目上の人や年長者に対する敬意と来客者に対するおもてなしの心により決められます。目上の人やお客様にはできるだけ良い席に着席して頂きますが、その部屋において最も良い席を上座（かみざ）と言います。[もっと詳しく](sub01.html)
![和室](img/top/top_02.jpg)
## 和室での宴会和室での席次・席順では床の間の前の席が上座となり、入り口に最も近い席が下座となります。長いテーブルを囲む場合は中央が上座となり、狭い場所や料理が遠くなる場所は下座となります。ただし同じ会社内での宴席の場合と接待の場合とでは、席次が変わってくるので注意しましょう。[もっと詳しく](sub02.html)
## 車内での席次・席順タクシーや運転手付きの乗用車では運転席の後ろが上座となり、後部座席に３名で座る時は真中が最も下座になります。しかしタクシーの場合上座の席は入り口から最も遠いため、乗り降りしづらいということにもなってしまいます。後部に３名座るような場合には本人の意向を確認して、上座にこだわらない柔軟さがあればより丁寧であるといえるでしょう。[もっと詳しく](sub03.html)
![タクシー](img/top/top_03.jpg)
## エレベーターのマナーエレベーターでは乗り口から遠い方が上座、乗り口から近い方が下座となり、操作盤の前が最も下座となります。目上の人と一緒にエレベーターに乗り込む場合は、入り口のドアを押さえて相手が安全に乗り込めるようにし、目上の人に先に乗って頂くようにして自分は一番最後に乗り込むようにします。[もっと詳しく](sub04.html)
[![ページトップ](img/common/pagetop.svg)](#main)

## Destiny 2トレーラー
[![Embedded YouTube video](https://img.youtube.com/vi/uO68EYzPWgU/0.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uO68EYzPWgU)
## Destiny 2とは？
人類は突如侵略をしてきた強大な軍団「レッドリージョン」の司令官「ガウル」の手に落ちてしまう。「ガウル」は人類を守る「ガーディアン」から力を奪い去り、「ガーディアン」たちも撤退を余儀なくされた。プレイヤーは生き残ったガーディアン達の一人として「レッドリージョン」に立ち向かい、故郷を取り戻すため、太陽系の惑星を巡りながら様々な武器や新しい能力を手に入れ、散らばった「ガーディアン」たちを集結させて再起を図るのであった。### 【PS4】Destiny 2

title: 日照市质监局抽查：配装眼镜产品不合格检出率为2.5% - 温州眼镜网演示站
text:
日照市质监局抽查：配装眼镜产品不合格检出率为2.5% - 温州眼镜网演示站## 日照市质监局抽查：配装眼镜产品不合格检出率为2.5%
来源：中国质量新闻网01-25 16:36
中国质量新闻网讯据日照市质量技术监督局官网2018年1月24日消息，2017年12月至2018年1月，该局组织开展了全市配装眼镜和食品用塑料包装产品质量专项监督抽查。结果显示，1批次配装眼镜产品不合格。
本次专项监督抽查累计抽检60家企业生产的63批次产品。其中，抽检40家眼镜配装企业的40批次产品，合格39批次，不合格检出率2.5%，产品合格率为97.5%；抽检20家食品用塑料包装生产企业的23批次产品，合格23批次，产品抽检合格率为100%。

## 关于万年历万年历是记录一定时间范围内的具体阳历与阴历的日期的年历，万年历就是记录一定时间范围内（比如100年或更多）的具体阳历与阴历的日期的年历，万年只是一种象征，表示时间跨度大。万年历可以说是我国古代传说中最古老的一部太阳历。为纪念历法编撰者万年功绩，便将这部历法命名为“万年历”。
中国始有历法大约在四千多年以前。甲骨历是全天下最古老的历书实物，甲骨历也就叫日历。日历中的历法分类:
**阴历：**阴历别称太阴历，是按月亮的月相周期来安排的历法。以月球绕行地球一周为一月，即以朔望月作为确定历月的基础，一年为十二个历月的历法。阴历的一个月叫做“朔望月”，阴历，论初一十五等不同时间月亮的阴晴圆缺，只管朔望月，不管回归年。所以和一年四季完全无关。
**干支历：**又称节气历或中国阳历，是用60组各不相同的天干地支标记年月日时的历法。主要由干支纪年、干支纪月、干支纪日、干支纪时四部分组成。既管年又管月，兼具二十四节气。
**农历：**属阴阳合历，以夏历（阴历）为基础，吸收了干支历二十四节气作为补充历法。我国的传统历法从严格意义上说不应该叫阴历，而是阴阳历。现被叫做“农历”，农历是涵盖月亮运行规律同太阳位置变化的阴阳合历。

回转式格栅除污机大致可以分为不锈钢回转清污机和普通碳钢回转式清污机，可以根据工作环境的腐蚀程度选择使用，这是由一种的耙齿厂装配成一组回转格栅链。在电机减速器的驱动下，耙齿链进行逆水流方向回转运动。耙齿链运转到设备的上部时，由于槽轮和弯轨的导向，使每组耙齿之间产生相对自清运动，绝大部分固体物质靠重...

title: 互动
text:
互动
****
来信人须知事项一、来信人应遵守中华人民共和国宪法、法律、法规和社会公德，如实反映情况，不得捏造、歪曲事实，诽谤、诬告、陷害和谩骂他人。二、对已经或者依法应当通过诉讼、仲裁、行政复议等法定途径解决的信访事项，不予受理。三、来信人必须留下真实姓名与联系方式，以便对来信事项调查核实。经办人员对来信人的姓名和联系方式会予以严格保密。信件遵循“网来网去”的原则，不接受纸质信件，不接待来人来访。四、来信内容应简明扼要，说清事实，原则上一信只反映一个问题。信件标题要点明主要问题，符合一般文书规范。五、来信人提交信件后，根据信件提交时选择的信件类型在“政民互动”页面的“区长信箱”、“在线投诉”、“在线咨询”、“在线建议”4个相对应的分类页面里查看。
六、来信人在得到处理结果反馈后，再次就同一问题进行反映，需写明前一封信件的提交时间、标题及信件类型等，以便查找。七、以下信件将被视为无效，不再进入处理程序：（一）需要展开具体调查和处理，但来信人姓名、联系方法填写不完整或不真实的信件；（二）内容不完整，表述事项不清楚，导致无法回答或难以开展调查的信件；（三）同一来信人在规定办理时效内多次提交的内容相同或相近的信件和一稿多投的信件；（四）超越“区长信箱”受理范围，或已进入司法程序（法院受理或已判决等）的事项，将不予受理。（五）不属于雨花区人民政府职权范围内，或无法通过本栏目处理程序进行处理的问题。（六）属于产品推销、社会中介服务需求等市场行为方面的；属于邀请函、通知函等公文交流方面的；属于内部行政管理方面应按正常渠道逐级汇报的；（七）已通过网络明确答复的；（八）转载网上论坛的有关内容。（九）紧急事项。欢迎浏览365bet体育投注网网站，
|[无障碍浏览](http://www.yuhua.gov.cn/Assistants/)

* 农业银行悠游世界信用卡优惠介绍2014年03月06日 09:25:52来源：[]()点击量：1421135次编辑：轩轩
1、卡样：
![](http://money.0513.org/upload/20140306/1394069073500543.png "悠游世界信用卡")
2、特色功能与服务
（1）全球消费“0”货币转换费
即日起至2015年12月31日，持卡人在全球范围以任意币种、任意渠道消费及取现零货币转换费（即“国际结算费”，一般为交易金额的1%\~1.5%），有效节约境外交易成本。
（2）便捷的还款体验
持卡人在境内外以任意币种交易，账单自动转换为人民币还款，也可选择直接以外币（欧元）还款，还款方式灵活便捷。（3）尊享港澳台5%奖励回馈
2014年1月1日至2014年12月31日，办卡预留电子邮箱的悠游世界卡主卡持卡人，将自动加入乐游赏奖励计划，在港澳台上千家知名商铺及全球知名在线商店，通过万事达卡网络刷卡消费，可享受5%奖励，奖励不设上限。
（4）健康关怀礼遇
2014年1月1日至2014年12月31日，持卡人可享7×24小时环球紧急医疗救助服务，包括旅行关怀，旅行中免费医疗咨询、免费协助服务（因服务过程中产生的实际费用需要客户自付）等，详询农行信用卡客服热线。
（5）白金级别尊贵礼遇
2014年办卡，首年年费全免，当年刷卡五笔免次年年费。持卡人还可享受“万事达卡大中华尊荣礼遇”。
a.东航公务舱“两人同行，一人免费”
即日起至2014年5月31日，持卡人通过东方航空网站（www.ceair.com）万事达卡活动专区购买指定国际航线公务舱机票，即可获赠同航班公务舱机票一张。
b.喜达屋旗下酒店，尊享8折优惠
即日起至2014年12月31日，持卡人在线预订喜达屋指定酒店或渡假村，入住2晚或以上，通过万事达卡网络支付消费，从第2晚开始，每晚可尊享8折尊荣礼遇。
c.高尔夫3至6折特惠礼遇
即日起至2014年12月31日，持卡人可享全国15家高尔夫球场果岭费3至6折。
以上信息仅供参考，最终以商家公布为准。本稿件为濠滨论坛网站独家原创稿件，版权所有，引用或转载请注明出处。理财相关资讯* [阿斯蒂芬](‘阿道夫’)

title: Olivier Goethals
text:
Olivier Goethals - 019
# Olivier Goethals
## Accept Change
## 10/09/2016 –28/10/2016
![](https://019-ghent.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/mdc_019_koksijde_006_LR-220x179.jpg)
S&D#025 is a 20m tall flagpole that was originally commissioned by the city of Kortrijk and was designed and realised by We Became Aware in the summer of 2015. In January 2016 the pole moved to Ghent to be placed on a pedestal designed by Olivier Goethals. From that moment, S&D#025 functions as a mobile exhibition space with a growing archive of Belgium’s largest flags.

徵信相信大家都聽過「男怕入錯行，女怕嫁錯郎」這句話，現今婚姻糾紛頻傳，離婚律更是節節攀升，種種社會現象都顯示出婚前徵信的重要性。在結婚之前應該調查清楚對方是否有任何不良嗜好，或者是否謊報家世背景等等，以避免日後悲劇的發生；結婚之前喜好與人發生一夜情的人，多半結了婚之後也不會安分，這種婚姻日後容易讓第三者介入，像這樣的情形，的確需要婚前徵信去防止。許多情侶或夫妻因為時間或者第三者的關係而生變，於是想要感情挽回，但是想要挽救已經生變的愛情談何容易，面對外面的花花世界、一夜情氾濫的現今，如何力抗外在誘惑，順利感情挽回？種種問題，您需要我們專業的協助！想要擁有美好的婚姻生活，婚前徵信著實是應該要有的舉動；人心隔肚皮，再加上對方刻意的欺瞞，誰又能真的了解對方？婚姻本來就可以說是一場賭注，但是沒有人願意輸，沒有人希望戀情生變才急於感情挽回，如果可以在步入禮堂之前就可以事先知道對方的交友是否複雜，是否喜好一夜情等淫亂私生活，更或者其實愛情不如想像中美好、兩人之間其實早已有了第三者介入，對方是否是真心想要和您在一起，還是只是為了您的錢？如果事先知道問題，就可以避免不幸婚姻的產生。許多人婚後發現兩人之間的差異，或者兩人之間有了第三者介入、對方暗自一夜情在外風流，才想要急於感情挽回或者後悔當初的識人不清，這些種種問題，婚前徵信其實都有很大的機率可以避免掉。徵信-感情挽回婚前徵信社的專業團隊可以協助您擁有幸福美好的家庭生活、避免您落入愛情騙子的圈套。現今社會到處充滿誘惑，當然也免不了有許多愛情騙子的存在；許多人難以在花花世界中保持自我，很容易就陷入一夜情的慾望之中，或者難以抵抗第三者的勾引，許多人表面上看起來忠厚老實，但是實際上呢？太多人設下陷阱，欺騙別人自己深愛對方，會永遠愛著對方、守護對方一輩子，實際上卻是看上對方口袋的錢！很多事實雖然傷人，但是及早發現就可以讓傷害降至最低；劈腿、網交、外遇在男女間流行，您是否擔心自己不小心成為受害者？讓我們專業的團隊幫助您調查，協助您檢視您的愛情，幫助您擁有美好的愛情生活！
